title: [Dread Lord's Suite, Fountain]
description: The ceiling in this area is far overhead, making the already large room appear that much more spacious.  Dominating the center of the floor is an elaborate fountain, crafted of intertwined onyx and white marble, and depicting a mighty demon ensnared by tendrils emanating from the outstretched hands of a sorceror.  The water bends and bows in spellbinding patterns, leaping across the structure and cascading down towards a shallow pool.

The streamer-congested ceiling is far overhead, making the already large room appear that much more spacious with the inclusion of dozens of half-dead fauna.  Dominating the center of the floor is an elaborate fountain, crafted of intertwined onyx and white marble, and depicting a demon ensnared by tendrils emanating from the outstretched hands of a sorcerer, their miens overshadowed by the addition of rouge and lip cream.  The fountain waters cascade down towards a shallow pool serving as an oasis for several mice.
paths: Obvious exits: north, northeast, southeast, south, west
Obvious exits: north, northeast, south, west
